03 - Environment Variables

  1. Create a Secret of type Opaque named kubescope-credentials in namespace kubescope. The secret should contain two keys: USERNAME and PASSWORD (case sensitive), with values of your choice [Ref]

  2. Edit/re-create the Deployment from Question 2, to add an envFrom block to the kubescope container. Note: You canâ€™t mount secrets in the deployment imperatively
    • The envFrom block should read from the Secret created in step 1 [Ref]

  3. Port-forward the Deployment (or Service) port 80 to local port 8000 [Ref]

  4. Access http://localhost:8000/v1/protected
    • Log in with the credentials you set up on step 1
